channel.title: The world is NOT coming to an end
channel.description: I just wanted to post this topic because I've seen a lot of crap being spread saying "the world's gonna end in 2012!". First, the world is NOT going to end. Second, 2012 is when the Mayan calendar resets. It just restarts! The Mayan calendar ends in 2012 and then it restarts. Don't ask me why. If you don't believe me and still think the world is going to end, then we'll just have to wait and see. The world "ends" on 12/21/2012 as some people say.

item.title: The world is NOT coming to an end
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:92, topic:294941”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=390035.msg2912458#msg2912458 date=1250188534]

It’s obvious that the world isn’t going to end on 12/12/12.

especially seeing as how that year was 1997 years ago

December 12, 2005 is written as 12/12/05.
Therefore, December 12, 2012 is written as 12/12/12.
Isn’t that obvious?

the year 05 has never previously it existed it would’ve been referenced as just 5 and secondly who da fuck types it out like that, stop being lazy and write the whole date out

you can write it either way in America.

Rest of world > America.

Yes. It’s obvious the rest of the world is larger than America.

and are: smarter, nicer, more respectful, thinner and actually speak their language in a way that other people can understand
[/quote]
LOL Gf america… but seriously, americans are full of themselves… back on topic, the world isnt coming to an end in 2012. eventually, yes. 2012? no.[/quote]
Every race is full of themselves. o_O

Read full topic
item.source: The world is NOT coming to an end

item.description:
@Lahdeedah2 wrote:

[quote=“Cuban0 Ftw, post:3, topic:294941”]It’s always possible, I saw on the history channel 10 things that could end it 2 of 10:

  1. World War 3 is always STRONG possibility as one country may nuke another country then we all die
  2. OR Global warming which is becoming a crisis all over America.

Anything can happen so don’t be so quick to think that it won’t end in year of 12.[/quote]We’re gonna end up living underground D:

Like Fallout 3. lol

a nuke will have huge impact on the global conditions (or it should from what I know) but one country nuking another does not mean everyone dying. It just means the local areas being affected. At least someone will be alive… unless every place on earth is nuked which I doubt will happen.

item.title: The world is NOT coming to an end
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:78, topic:294941”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=390035.msg2914662#msg2914662 date=1250330116]

The world has a chance of ending at any time. Who knows what goes on out there in space. It’s not like we could be warned before something exploded and killed us…I’m not really sure what would happen. Nostradamus made many predictions way back in the day and they all came true. He also predicted 2012. I guess we just have to see. Either way, I want to see the movie 2012.

you’ve been brainwashed. If the world ended everytime nostradamus had supposedly predicted it then it would have happened more frequently than your birthday. Everytime people who belive his bullshit look at his charts and decipher what he wrote and they pick a date out of their ass. Then when the world doesnt end, they go back and say ‘oh i mistranslated’ and pick another date. Thats how nostradamus’ writings have worked. Alot of the decoding of his works are the biggest load of bullshit ive ever seen. Ever heard the phrase you see what you want to see? Well basically they decipher Nostradamus’ work by saying that he used certain cryptic languages to write his work and that you pick the letters from each sentence and so forth. What they are effectively doing is just going through each word/line/paragraph picking up enough letters to form a historical event that was after his time to show he could predict stuff or something in the future. If you believe the writings of nostradamus then you really need to get out more, or get a magic 8 ball its on the same level
[/quote]And the fact that no one ever pays attention to the predictions that weren’t true at all. They lead some that seem like they’ve come true. Fake Jamaican.

Btw, a large portion of our diseases somehow came from space. I remember hearing about it on the history channel. If anyone watched it, please elaborate because I didn’t fully pay attention.[/quote]
when missiles from outer space strike our planet it potentially brings with it bacteria that we have no idea about. This can cause diseases

Read full topic

He also predicted 2012. I guess we just have to see. Either way, I want to see the movie 2012.
[/quote]
you’ve been brainwashed. If the world ended everytime nostradamus had supposedly predicted it then it would have happened more frequently than your birthday. Everytime people who belive his bullshit look at his charts and decipher what he wrote and they pick a date out of their ass. Then when the world doesnt end, they go back and say ‘oh i mistranslated’ and pick another date. Thats how nostradamus’ writings have worked. Alot of the decoding of his works are the biggest load of bullshit ive ever seen. Ever heard the phrase you see what you want to see? Well basically they decipher Nostradamus’ work by saying that he used certain cryptic languages to write his work and that you pick the letters from each sentence and so forth. What they are effectively doing is just going through each word/line/paragraph picking up enough letters to form a historical event that was after his time to show he could predict stuff or something in the future. If you believe the writings of nostradamus then you really need to get out more, or get a magic 8 ball its on the same level[/quote]And the fact that no one ever pays attention to the predictions that weren’t true at all. They lead some that seem like they’ve come true. Fake Jamaican.

Btw, a large portion of our diseases somehow came from space. I remember hearing about it on the history channel. If anyone watched it, please elaborate because I didn’t fully pay attention.

Read full topic

item.title: The world is NOT coming to an end
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Chassy13:

The world has a chance of ending at any time. Who knows what goes on out there in space. It’s not like we could be warned before something exploded and killed us…I’m not really sure what would happen. Nostradamus made many predictions way back in the day and they all came true. He also predicted 2012. I guess we just have to see. Either way, I want to see the movie 2012.

you’ve been brainwashed. If the world ended everytime nostradamus had supposedly predicted it then it would have happened more frequently than your birthday. Everytime people who belive his bullshit look at his charts and decipher what he wrote and they pick a date out of their ass. Then when the world doesnt end, they go back and say ‘oh i mistranslated’ and pick another date. Thats how nostradamus’ writings have worked. Alot of the decoding of his works are the biggest load of bullshit ive ever seen. Ever heard the phrase you see what you want to see? Well basically they decipher Nostradamus’ work by saying that he used certain cryptic languages to write his work and that you pick the letters from each sentence and so forth. What they are effectively doing is just going through each word/line/paragraph picking up enough letters to form a historical event that was after his time to show he could predict stuff or something in the future. If you believe the writings of nostradamus then you really need to get out more, or get a magic 8 ball its on the same level

Read full topic
